### Boxplot pro-tips

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(tidyquant)
theme_set(theme_tq())

mtcars %>% tibble() %>% 
    ggplot(aes(x = as.factor(cyl), y = mpg)) +
    geom_boxplot() + coord_flip()
```
